html:
5.7.25  3:14 am   would you please perform live?

      could happen. but i've had zero practice leading a live show. and i TYPICALLY dont do anything publicly without at least 20 years of practice. just to give you a general idea of what we're looking at

5.7.25  12:25 am   do you have a preference for drum dampeners

      how about a big ol rectangular slice of chicago deep dish pizza

5.7.25  12:20 am   what are your thoughts on literature?

      it will work, in a pinch

5.6.25  11:54 pm   How do I tell if I am done with a song or if I should add more?

      you can't tell, but it's also okay if you make the wrong choice

5.6.25  11:34 pm   If someone asked you to stand on one leg, which leg would you stand on?

      it doesn't really matter

5.6.25  10:41 pm   What do you think the first ever human name was?

      beb

5.6.25  10:24 pm   what is your favorite vegetable, from a musical standpoint

      coconut

5.6.25  9:39 pm   Tell me a bedtime story 

      once up on a time there was a bed. that's bedtime!

5.6.25  8:32 pm   what to do when you feel guilty of the way you live

      maybe you can assess the plausibility of what you imagine actual guilt free living to be. That way, you can either achieve it, or, not blame yourself for not achieving the impossible

5.6.25  7:45 pm   Do you do any good impressions?

      only when i'm least expecting it

5.6.25  7:43 pm   how do you manage your workload without getting stressed out with all the things you want to do.

      i don't really know

5.6.25  7:41 pm   paradoxically, it seems the way i want to receive love from my friends is not how my personality leads them to give me love and now i'm jealous

      suddenly i'm curious about what your methods are for giving love

5.6.25  6:45 pm   i wish water was real

      how would that make it different

5.6.25  5:22 pm   In your bio it says you came to earth, may I ask how difficult the earth citizenship exam is? I'm studying for it right now

      dont worry you already passed

5.6.25  4:33 pm   Are most people that we regard as close friends destined to one day become strangers to us?

      no, i wouldn' say so

5.6.25  3:45 pm   I feel like a lot of people me included at times like to make strawmen type figures so that we can dump our frustations at certain groups of thought that people have. When in reality it is just a strawman and not a real person or reflective of a real person's thoughts. Do you agree with this?

      sure, but, we could also point out that the existence of a strawman, could in fact be a strawman

5.6.25  3:20 pm   i dont like to admit certain things about me sometimes because they may be irrelevant or whatever reason. i think you may similar so thats why im typing here. my friends get annoyed by it and then they annoy me about it, which is annoying. ive tried telling them that i dont think its important to know blahblahnlah about me and its just not relevant, but they do not relent

      this is a nice challenge for you to come up with an answer that's really worthwile, despite the mundane context. i've seen it done

5.6.25  2:59 pm   why do cheese have holes

      every now and then there needs to take a break from being cheese

5.6.25  1:19 pm   any tips for writing memorable instrumental riffs or lyrical hooks?

      relax the insufferable tension in the room a little by first writing 10 unmemorable ones

5.6.25  1:15 pm   my favourite song of yours is New Canaan. what do you think it means?

      it just means you like it

5.6.25  1:14 pm   in february 2019 you said "i aspire to wear my pants sideways". have you now achieved this feat?

      first we need to achieve finding out the original context

5.6.25  1:13 pm   Do you also think it is a scam that all skittles taste the same?

      i have never tasted a skittle

5.6.25  1:00 pm   HI BILL

      oh hi

5.6.25  12:54 pm   Are you mad at me

      who is this, nevermind, no

5.6.25  11:52 am   If you were to perform your songs live, which song of yours do you think would be the most difficult to perform, on a technical or musical level?

      any song can be performed or arranged with any level of complexity, but, usually in music, when the player is having difficulty, it doesn't sound good. so whatever happens, the players need to be happy and having a fun time, if you want the results to be any good

5.6.25  11:12 am   thoughts on so-called "flushable" wipes?

      difficult to unflush

5.6.25  8:59 am   If the future is yesterday, is the past tomorrow or today?

      if the future is yesterday then the past was further back

5.6.25  8:21 am   Have you ever went online to explain the things you feel and/or express the things you mean? I know this is part of one of your songs, but have you ever done it?

      yes

5.6.25  8:09 am   How do you determine what questions to answer? 

      that's easy, i'll just answer this one

5.6.25  7:49 am   is grabbing a random pencil from the floor theft?

      sometimes it depends who owns the floor

5.6.25  4:44 am   are you a crocodile

      i don't think so

5.6.25  4:15 am   How can things be normal all of the time, as opposed to never?

      via attitude adjustment

5.6.25  3:35 am   whats the optimal amount of bananas per second to consume?

      about .00001

5.6.25  2:31 am   Should there be an international speed limit for snakes, bears, moose and several other animals?

      no

5.6.25  2:11 am   Have you ever been betrayed, abandoned, or otherwise made an incoherent fool out of?

      only in fiction

5.6.25  2:11 am   how do I not feel hopelessness

      write down a list of 100 things you could do. even if you have to fake your way through some of it

5.6.25  1:53 am   what else can go in salt and pepper shakers?

     how about gold bullion

      does that change what they're called

     not at first, but eventually the name will catch up to reflect what it's being used for

5.6.25  1:45 am   thoughts on architecture?

      dank

5.6.25  1:30 am   What if someone made a train car the length of the entire railway, so it is always in both destinations?

      that's fine but you're gonna need another vehicle to bring people from one end of the train to the other

5.6.25  1:26 am   i have a controversial opinion that everyone has at least one controversial opinion.

     that doesn't sound controversial to me

      so Bill, what is one controversial opinion that you have or have had?

     1=2

     also, just a reminder for you to have a good day, in case you aren't having one. trying to memorize the ingredients list on the back of a shampoo bottle can help.

      ok

5.5.25  11:44 pm   Is this the worst-ever era of American pop culture?

      the current moment is always widely considered 'the worst', and this paradox is precisely the reason you can be sure it's never true

5.5.25  11:35 pm   what's the best way I can study for my AP Exam that's in two days

      i'd probably spend the whole time figuring out what AP means

5.5.25  11:30 pm   why do we pronounce 'comfortable' the way we do? it makes me uncomfortable, but saying it the way it's spelled feels even worse. it's like a lose-lose

      like an obstacle course, it's gonna make you better at language

5.5.25  11:11 pm   Opinions on the show "blues clues"

      i've never seen it

5.5.25  10:49 pm   i have this problem where whenever i'm walking around, sort of improv singing, i can sometimes come up with REALLY good melodies or a REALLY good chorus, so i instantly find myself wanting to make that a full song, but then when i get a pen and paper, i just realise i have no idea how to start the song to eventually get to that good chorus part and no matter how hard i try i never figure it out

have you ever dealt with this?

     sure, i've spent my whole life dealing with this

     
eitherway do you know how i can solve this (if so then how?)?

      this is much easier when your starting idea actually belongs at the beginning of the song. if the starting idea is in the middle, you're kind of screwed. the songwriting gods are never comfortable when you try to do it out of order. but here's a trick, maybe: try to go forward from the chorus and see what comes after the chorus. if you're lucky you will end up at the chorus again soon. then you'll have a pretty good hint

5.5.25  9:35 pm   one time i got excited and cartwheeled and it was really scary. so i don't think i will cartwheel again. do you know anything you can do to channel excitement that isn't cartwheeling. ok thank you

      you just can raise both hands, that should be ok

5.5.25  9:34 pm   Hope you are doing well. People that spread cheer deserve to be happy?

      can't argue with that. but they should also deserve to be happy even if they don't spread cheer

5.5.25  8:16 pm   how many instruments do you play, Mr Wurtz?

      counting instruments is not my strong point

5.5.25  8:16 pm   Do you have a favorite book/piece of literature?

     no

     If so, what genre(s) do you enjoy? :)

     i think it would always be more fun to see authors break and bend genres. i mean they're not stable anyway

5.5.25  8:09 pm   do you like hexagons

      yes but to be fair i like other things too
